page.title: 07The Village Of Bodenham.
page.content: The Village of Bodenham is an attractive, and lively place.It is an ancient site, with a church dating back 700 years.The housing is mixed, a number of well kept half timbered, stone, Georgian, early 20th century brick, a recent modern housing estate, a few red brick council houses, the old people's bungalows and a number of in fill modern private houses. The most recent building is the new surgery, completed last year. Bodenham has a village hall,2 schools, a public house, a shop with a post office, a garage, a home for the aged, a home for handicapped and a chapel. There are many clubs, fellowships and games teams - The Bowling Club, The Gardening Club, W.I., Bridge, Tennis, Ramblers, The Christian Fellowship, and the Leisure Club.
